channel.title: CVE Feed for MRW -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MRW -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6506|2024-08-01T21:41:03.535Z -- mrw -- mrw%20plugin
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in the MRW plugin, in its 5.4.3 version, affecting the "mrw_log" functionality. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to obtain other customers' order information and access sensitive information such as name and phone number. This vulnerability also allows an attacker to create or overwrite shipping labels.
